1298540.name: Halloween Candy Reclaim
1298540.description:
NEW December 2025: Online Multiplayer!

Now you can hop onto that cart together! Play Team, Coop or Versus - things are easier when you are together!

Play online or within your LAN - Crossplay with Meta Quest is supported.

About

Grab your pickle guns, climb on top of your candy-vacuuming, self-driving chariot, and clean the village of the candy-stealing naughty mobs who have taken control! Take back insane amounts of candy, duck the evil stuff those baddies throw at you, and battle your way to the final boss!

Candy Reclaim is your perfect family-friendly, decidedly non-scary, wacky party game. For this Halloween, it is full of pumpkins, ghosts, skeletons, and candy, challenging, and just plain fun!

Levels, Difficulties, Points

Battle your way through seven levels in five difficulty settings. Collect candy for points and eat it for refilling your health, and build up a shield. But don't trigger a sugar overload - sugar is bad for you!

You will also be rated on accuracy as well as how much candy you manage to eat during each level.

Create local profiles for everyone for a friendly competition! Who scores the most?

How To Play

Play seated or standing - you'll use your controllers to shoot as well as eat the candy.

The game auto-adjusts to any height of the player.

Five difficulty levels ranging from Piece-Of-Cake (no damage!) to Frustrating (lots of damage!) mean everyone can play, and finish (!), this game.
1298540.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
